title: juniperion
author: juniperion
content: Altava Group is issuing Bored Ape Golf Club (BAGC) NFTs courtesy of Yuga Labs. Byte Exchange has recently completed a partnership agreement with Alpha Capital and Altava Group.In this context, the whitelist sale of Bored Ape Golf Club NFTs will be held on Bytepad. Byte Exchange will launch Bytepad, Turkey's first launchpad platform, with the BAGC Whitelist pre-sale.10,000 units of the BAGC collection will be produced and only 2000 units are open for public mint. The remaining NFTs are only open to Yugalabs and Altava ecosystem. Bytedex is the official sales partner within the scope of pre-emption rights of 2000 units.About BAGCWHITELIST PRICE: 350 USDT or BUSDSTARTING DATE: 03.12.2022 Time: 22.00 (GMT +3)END DATE: FCFS (First come, first serve)Minting Date: 22.12.2022Minting Cost: 0.50 ETH (0.45 ETH with ByteDex special discount)Minting Platform: OpenseaBuying Whitelist means that you have guaranteed buying BAGC NFT.For participating to Whitelist pre-sale of BAGC:1) Register to Byte Exchange (https://exchange.bytedex.io/signup)2) Login to Bytepad with the same username (mail) and password. (https://bytepad.bytedex.io/)3) Deposit 350 USDT OR BUSD to your wallet on Bytepad.4) Go to "NFT WL" tap on Bytepad and buy it.5) Hurry up! This is FCFS.BEXT STAKING ADVANTAGES* Between 5,000 BEXT and 10,000 BEXT Stake : 5% Discount* Between 10,001 BEXT to 50,000 BEXT Stake: 10% Discount* Between 50,001 BEXT and above Stakes: 20% Discount* Special Addition for Commemorative Coin Holders: 5% Discount(Stake period must be at least 180 days.)FOR STAKING OF YOUR BEXT TOKENS:1) Register to Byte Exchange (https://exchange.bytedex.io/signup)2) Do KYC-2.3) Deposit Fiat or cryptocurrency as USDT or BUSD.4) Buy Bext tokens.5) Login to https://stake.bytedex.io/ (with the same email and password as Byte Exchange)6) Stake for at least 180 days.NOTE: For taking advantage of staking, Stake your Bext after registration to Byte Exchange. Then buy NFT WL on Bytepad.Announcement

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: That is a unbelievable price and it’s huge sale looking at the minted NFT for this show. I mean 2000 NFT sand price for each of them is around 350 bucks. That is 700k USD man!! It’s insane how huge amount of money is flooding into the crypto market all the time. I’m especially jealous of Bored Apes because they are making noise everywhere and investors are actually following their trends. This is so simple strategy. They have Cool brand name now and they have valued themselves to the moon. So whatever price tag they will put it’s gonna be liked by investors. These days investors would think 350 buck is nothing but collectively its huge pre sale for these companies. Wondering how far they gonna get with this NFT stuff.

comments.author: juniperion
comments.body: Today at 4 pm (GMT+3), Altava, Alpha Capital and Byte Exchange CEOs are holding an AMA at Twitter Space. Ask your questions to Andy, Altava CEO.BAGC AMA Event
